content: lion brand pattern # chs-bafg skill level intermediate level 3 homespun® article #790 10 balls crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm special stitches raised double_crochet at the front fp double_crochet raised double_crochet at the back bp double_crochet work 8-row pattern until throw measures about 50 inches long work crochet border to finish crochet terms are in u s terminology
